title: TVS Motor strengthens product portfolio in Kenya
description: "Kenya is an important market for us. Most two-wheelers in Kenya double up as delivery vehicles and customers always look for long-lasting and durable products. Our leading global brand TVS HLX has consistently catered to these evolving mobility needs backed by a wide service network...," company head-international business, H G Rahul Nayak said.
content: (You can now subscribe to our Economic Times WhatsApp channel)
